description: This source file defines a React-like component for editing a note in a personal notes manager application. It imports hooks and components, manages state, and renders the UI for editing or viewing the note based on loading state and existence.

methods.name: component$
methods.description: Main component function handling the note editing page logic, state management, and rendering.

methods.name: head
methods.description: Exported constant defining the document head metadata for this page.

calls: store.upsert({ id: noteId, title: n.title, content: n.content })
